sn8.2:3.1: 2. Aratīsutta
sn8.2:4.2: āyasmā vaṅgīso āḷaviyaṃ viharati aggāḷave cetiye āyasmatā nigrodhakappena upajjhāyena saddhiṃ.
sn8.2:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nigrodhakappo pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṃ pavisati, sāyaṃ vā nikkhamati aparajju vā kāle.
sn8.2:4.4: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato vaṅgīsassa anabhirati uppannā hoti, rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃseti.
sn8.2:4.6: “alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā;
sn8.2:4.7: dulladdhaṃ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṃ;
sn8.2:4.8: yassa me anabhirati uppannā, rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃseti;
sn8.2:4.9: taṃ kutettha labbhā, yaṃ me paro anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā abhiratiṃ uppādeyya.
sn8.2:4.10: Yannūnāhaṃ attanāva attano anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā abhiratiṃ uppādeyyan”ti.
sn8.2:4.11: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso attanāva attano anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā abhiratiṃ uppādetvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn8.2:5.1: * “Aratiñca ratiñca pahāya,
sn8.2:5.4: Nibbanatho arato sa hi bhikkhu.
sn8.2:7.4: Yo ettha na limpati taṃ munimāhu.
sn8.2:8.2: Puthū janatāya adhammā niviṭṭhā;
sn8.2:8.4: No pana duṭṭhullabhāṇī sa bhikkhu.
